name: Product Design Process
description:
This file template for product design process, based on design thinking and double diamond models, may help you optimize your work.

Well, I hope so🤓


——

Processes may differ from team to team in different projects. Therefore, this template can and should be adapted to your processes, needs and goals.


——

Please share your experience, with this template, did you adapt this? How? If you have any feedback, suggestions or bugs, feel free to write me! 👇
